questionSetStimulus:
For the following exercises, assume these statements are true: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>p</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>:</mtext>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">p{\text{:}}</annotation></semantics></math> Faheem is a software engineer, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>q</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>:</mtext>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">q{\text{:}}</annotation></semantics></math> Ann is a project manager, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>r</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>:</mtext>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">r{\text{:}}</annotation></semantics></math>  Giacomo works with Faheem, and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>s</mi>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mtext>:</mtext>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">s{\text{:}}</annotation></semantics></math> The software application was completed on time. Translate each of the following statements to symbols, then construct a truth table to determine its truth value.
